Brief

Elmer ≈åtautahi 2023 is a dedicated app designed to enhance the experience of attendees at a specific art trail event. This app serves as a digital companion, facilitating users in exploring interactive maps, sharing social updates, and participating actively in the event while navigating through the exhibits.
